Southwest Center
Walking Directions

From the Sheraton hotel to the ILC building

Leaving the front of the hotel turn left and walk about 100 feet to the intersection of Speedway and Campbell. Turn left (south) on Campbell and walk to Third Street. Cross Campbell onto campus and go straight (west) along “the mall” for about 1/4 mile. The ILC is in front of you, underground, between the main library and the psychology building. The lecture room 140 is underground, near the southwest corner of the building.

From the Marriott hotel to the ILC building

Leaving the front of the hotel take Second Street east (straight ahead) to Park Street. Turn right (south) on Park and walk one block to University Boulevard. Turn left into campus and walk east. The building in front of you is “Old Main”, the original building of the University. Go around it (either side) and continue east for another 1/4 mile. The ILC is in front of you, underground, between the main library and the psychology building. The lecture room 140 is underground, near the southwest corner of the building.

The University and the Marriott and Sheraton Hotels
